needLogin: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §fPlease enter your password directly in chat.

errors.server: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §cThere is an issue when connecting to the server, contact the administrator.
errors.confirm: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §cPassword is NOT identical to the first one.
errors.handle: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §cSorry, we will finish your request soon. If it takes too long, contact the administrator.
errors.noUser: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §cYou are not whitelisted on this server.
errors.nameIncorrect: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §cYou should use "[correct]", not this to login.
errors.mailExist: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §cYour email already exists in our database. Try another one.
errors.usernameExist: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §cYour username is already registered in our database. Try another one.
errors.loginExist: §6§l[§eSodion§bAuth§6§l] §cYou have been logged from another place.
